directions: Combine Chardonnay wine, pineapple chunks, lemonade concentrate, rum, triple sec, grapes, apple, orange, and lime in a large pitcher. Refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight.
Stir lemon-lime soda into pitcher just before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice
title: White Sangria with Lemonade
